channel.title: How do you make shops? Without messinga anyother shop up?
channel.description:
How do you make shops without messing up anyother shops i just want a clean guy to hold a shop please help me..
Well here is the problem. When i autospawn the shophandler where i want it and then i compile and go into it and choose what i want to go in it, it already has stuff in it please help me!

item.title: How do you make shops? Without messinga anyother shop up?
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

well you need to use a different npc
because one npc is tied to a shop
i think theres a way to use the same npc id
with “if” and “else if” ill try and find
a way to make it so you can use a
npc for more than shop

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make shops? Without messinga anyother shop up?
